subprocess_flow.description: The initial phase involves collecting and documenting the detailed requirements for the software product. This includes understanding user needs, business objectives, and technical constraints. The Product Manager collaborates with stakeholders to create comprehensive user stories and acceptance criteria.
success_criteria: Clear user stories and acceptance criteria
subprocess_flow.purpose: To define the scope and functionality of the software product.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to gathering and documenting software requirements.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Conduct thorough stakeholder interviews and workshops

governance_requirements: Regular review of requirements by stakeholders

subprocess_flow.description: In this phase, the architecture and design of the software system are created based on the documented requirements. This includes defining the system components, data structures, interfaces, and security considerations. The Architect works closely with the development team to ensure the design is scalable, maintainable, and secure.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To create a blueprint for the software development process.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to designing the software system architecture.

subprocess_flow.description: This phase involves writing the actual software code based on the system design. Developers follow coding standards and best practices to ensure code quality and maintainability. Regular code reviews and unit testing are conducted to identify and fix defects early in the development process.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To implement the software functionality as designed.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to writing and reviewing software code.

subprocess_flow.description: This phase involves testing the software to ensure it meets the specified requirements and is free of defects. Various testing methods, including unit testing, integration testing, system testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT), are employed. The QA team works closely with the development team to resolve any identified issues.
success_criteria: Successful completion of all test cases
subprocess_flow.purpose: To ensure the software meets quality standards and user expectations.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to testing and ensuring the quality of the software.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement thorough testing and bug fixing processes

subprocess_flow.description: In this phase, the tested software is deployed to the production environment. This includes configuring the environment, deploying the code, and performing final testing to ensure everything is working as expected. The DevOps team automates the deployment process to ensure it is efficient and reliable.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To make the software available to users.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to deploying the software to the production environment.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement automated deployment processes and rollback plans

subprocess_flow.description: This ongoing phase involves providing maintenance and support for the deployed software. This includes monitoring the system, fixing bugs, and providing customer support. The support team works closely with the development team to resolve any issues and ensure the software continues to meet user needs.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To ensure the software continues to meet user needs and remains stable.
subprocess_flow.scope: Encompasses all activities related to maintaining and supporting the deployed software.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement monitoring and bug fixing processes
